model.Piece

    • Uses of Piece in controller

      Methods in controller that return Piece 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Piece AI.findKing(boolean isWhite)
      Returns a reference to the king on the team specified by isWhite.
      Piece BoardController.getPieceByCoords(int row, int col)
      Gets the piece from the model at position (row,col).
      Piece Controller.handleEnPassantCaptures(Move move)
      If execution gets to this method, then Move parameter move is valid.
      static Piece RuleEngine.processMove(Move move)
      Handles the movement of parameter move on the real board, and returns a reference to any piece that got captured
      Methods in controller with parameters of type Piece 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int AI.computeCastlingBonus(Piece king)
      Returns a bonus if there have been less than 10 moves and the move being considered is a castling move
      boolean Controller.isAcceptableInput(Piece piece)
      Returns true if it is the human's turn and a piece was moved that is the color of the current player
      boolean MoveGenerator.isEnemyPiece(Piece piece, int row, int col)
      Returns true if the piece on square (row,col) is not the same color as parameter piece.
      boolean MoveGenerator.isEnemyPieceOrEmpty(Piece piece, int row, int col)
      Returns true if the piece on square (row,col) is not the same color as parameter piece, or if it is null.
      boolean BoardController.setPieceByCoords(int row, int col, Piece piece)
      Sets a position on the board to Piece piece if row and col are in range [0,7].
      static void RuleEngine.undoChanges(Piece capturedPiece, Move move)
      If parameter capturedPiece is a real piece, it is returned to the board and the piece list in the model.
